newsitem.title: EU: OFFICIAL JOURNAL CONTENTS - OJ C 3 OF JANUARY 7, 1997.
newsitem.headline: OFFICIAL JOURNAL CONTENTS - OJ C 3 OF JANUARY 7, 1997.

text.p: (Note - contents are displayed in reverse order to that in the printed Journal)
ASSENT No 24/96 given by the Council pursuant to Article 95 of the Treaty establishing the European Coal and Steel Community (97/C 3/05)
ASSENT No 23/96 given by the Council pursuant to Article 95 of the Treaty establishing the European Coal and Steel Community (97/C 3/04)
Notice of initiation of an interim review of the anti-dumping measures applicable to certain imports of silicon metal originating in Brazil (97/C 3/03)
Commission communication on combating child sex tourism (97/C 3/02)
